meanings.sent1: The robot was preprogrammed to perform a dance routine.
meanings.sent2: I preprogrammed my alarm clock to wake me up at 7 AM.
meanings.sent3: The preprogrammed washing machine started dancing to the music.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a preprogrammed computer, always following the same routine.
meanings.sent5: The preprogrammed instructions were etched into his memory.

meanings.sent1: The preprogrammed settings on the microwave made it easy to heat up leftovers.
meanings.sent2: The preprogrammed software was ready to use right out of the box.
meanings.sent3: The preprogrammed robot seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her responses felt preprogrammed, lacking spontaneity.
meanings.sent5: The preprogrammed route guided us safely through the forest.
